title: There's Pumpkin About You
author: Athena Carstairs
description: One deteremined party planner + one grumpy pumpkin farmer = a fall to remember...

title: The Pumpkin Spice Cafe
author: Laurie Gilmore
description: A cozy romantic mystery for fans of Gilmore Girls with a grumpy x sunshine dynamic, a small-town setting, and a HEA guaranteed!

title: Fourth Wing
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: Follow Violet Sorrengail, a young woman forced into a brutal training program to become a dragon rider, navigating danger, rivalry, and unexpected bonds in the kingdom of Navarre.

title: Not Quite Dead Yet
author: Holly Jackson
description: Could you solve your own murder before it’s too late? Catch the killer before the countdown ticks its last second in Holly Jackson’s exhilarating adult debut.

title: Hot Wax
author: M.L. Rio
description: Grief, love and rock and roll. After her musician father’s death, one woman sets out to discover the truth about one mysterious night that haunted her for decades.

title: A Soul to Keep
author: Opal Reyne
description: Reia is a young woman chosen as a sacrifice to a demon-like creature who seeks compansionship in exchange for protecting her village from other demons.
